Description.Text: Located in Aberdeen's West End on the edge of the bustling city cent-re, only 15 minutes from Aberdeen Airport and 10 minutes from local rail and bus stations. The fully refurbished and extended Palm Court Hotel has reopened following a multi million pound investment. It now features The Bothy Restaurant, The Whisky Bar, a custom built Wedding Ceremony Room, three further meeting, event and function rooms, as well as 23 newly refurbished and stylishly designed contemporary bedrooms. With five twin and 18 queen rooms to choose from, you'll be spoiled for choice in the new hotel. Complete with Plasma television, DVD player and internet access, they offer the most stylish surroundings and best nights sleep in the city. Other facilities available include tea and coffee making facilities; hairdryers, dry cleaning facilities; iron & ironing board and DVD films for hire are available on request.

Situated in Aberdeen's West End on the edge of the bustling city cent-re, 15 minutes from Aberdeen Airport and 10 minutes from local rail and bus stations. Easily located from both the North and South of the City with plentiful on-site parking.

Double Room - Double Ranch with one double bed includes A newly refurbished contemporary double ensuite offering fabulously comfortable accommodation complete with Plasma television, DVD player and internet access. Offering the most stylish surroundings and best nights sleep in the city. Other facilities available include tea & coffee making facilities.
